[Home](./index.md) &gt; [state-db](./state-db.md)

## state-db package

A library for persisting state in a local db.

## Remarks

The implementation uses both indexedDB and localStorage.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [StateDbModule](./state-db.statedbmodule.md) | Responsible for injecting core providers. Should only be imported in root. |
|  [StateDbService](./state-db.statedbservice.md) |  |
|  [StateReaderService](./state-db.statereaderservice.md) |  |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SetPersistedStateAction](./state-db.setpersistedstateaction.md) |  |
|  [StatePropConfig](./state-db.statepropconfig.md) | Represents a object with configurations for a state property that should be persisted by the db. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SetPersistedStateAction](./state-db.setpersistedstateaction.md) | Action responsible for setting state from storage. |
|  [STATE\_DB\_ACTION\_FILTER](./state-db.state_db_action_filter.md) |  |
|  [STATE\_DB\_CONFIG](./state-db.state_db_config.md) |  |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DbActionFilter](./state-db.dbactionfilter.md) | Represents an action filter used to prevent certain state changes from being persisted. |
|  [MapFn](./state-db.mapfn.md) |  |
|  [StateDbConfig](./state-db.statedbconfig.md) | Represents a key/value object with configurations of the db properties. |
|  [StorageType](./state-db.storagetype.md) | Supported storage types for persisting data |
